verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-ach, o the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> [Tmiz-MorA Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid. of David חַלְּצֵ֣נִי <S%H2502><s%> chal-le-Tze-ni Deliver יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh me O LORD מֵאָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> me-'a-Dam man רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> Ra'; from the evil מֵאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> me-'Ish man חֲמָסִ֣ים <S%H2555><s%> cha-ma-Sim me from the violent תִּנְצְרֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5341><s%> tin-tze-Re-ni. preserve

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Who חָשְׁב֣וּ <S%H2803><s%> cha-she-Vu Which imagine רָע֣וֹת <S%H7451><s%> ra-'ot mischiefs בְּלֵ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> be-Lev; in [their] heart כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all manner י֝֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom, continually יָג֥וּרוּ <S%H1481><s%> ya-Gu-ru are they gathered together מִלְחָמֽוֹת׃ <S%H4421><s%> mil-cha-Mot. [for] war

שָֽׁנֲנ֣וּ <S%H8150><s%> sha-na-Nu They have sharpened לְשׁוֹנָם֮ <S%H3956><s%> le-sho-Nam their tongues כְּֽמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> ke-mov- as נָ֫חָ֥שׁ <S%H5175><s%> na-Chash like a serpent חֲמַ֥ת <S%H2534><s%> cha-Mat poison עַכְשׁ֑וּב <S%H5919><s%> 'ach-Shuv; adders' תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat is under שְׂפָתֵ֣ימוֹ <S%H8193><s%> se-fa-Tei-mov [is] under their lips סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

שָׁמְרֵ֤נִי <S%H8104><s%> sha-me-Re-ni Keep יְהוָ֨ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh me O LORD מִ֘ידֵ֤י <S%H3027><s%> mi-Dei from the hands רָשָׁ֗ע <S%H7563><s%> ra-Sha', of the wicked מֵאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> me-'Ish man חֲמָסִ֣ים <S%H2555><s%> cha-ma-Sim me from the violent תִּנְצְרֵ֑נִי <S%H5341><s%> tin-tze-Re-ni; preserve אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Who חָ֝שְׁב֗וּ <S%H2803><s%> cha-she-Vu, who have purposed לִדְח֥וֹת <S%H1760><s%> lid-Chot to overthrow פְּעָמָֽי׃ <S%H6471><s%> pe-'a-Mai. my goings

טָֽמְנֽוּ־ <S%H2934><s%> ta-me-nu- have hid גֵאִ֨ים׀ <S%H1343><s%> ge-'Im The proud פַּ֡ח <S%H6341><s%> pach a snare לִ֗י Li, וַחֲבָלִ֗ים <S%H2256><s%> va-cha-va-Lim, for me and cords פָּ֣רְשׂוּ <S%H6566><s%> Pa-re-su they have spread רֶ֭שֶׁת <S%H7568><s%> Re-shet a net לְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> le-yad- by מַעְגָּ֑ל <S%H4570><s%> ma'-Gal; the wayside מֹקְשִׁ֖ים <S%H4170><s%> mo-ke-Shim gins שָֽׁתוּ־ <S%H7896><s%> sha-tu- they have set לִ֣י li סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. for me Selah

אָמַ֣רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ti I said לַ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֵ֣לִי <S%H410><s%> 'E-li Thou [art] my God אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah; you הַאֲזִ֥ינָה <S%H238><s%> ha-'a-Zi-nah hear יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol the voice תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃ <S%H8469><s%> ta-cha-nu-Nai. of my supplications

יְהֹוִ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh O GOD אֲ֭דֹנָי <S%H136><s%> 'A-do-nai the Lord עֹ֣ז <S%H5797><s%> 'oz the strength יְשׁוּעָתִ֑י <S%H3444><s%> ye-shu-'a-Ti; of my salvation סַכֹּ֥תָה <S%H5526><s%> sak-Ko-tah thou hast covered לְ֝רֹאשִׁ֗י <S%H7218><s%> le-ro-Shi, my head בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom in the day נָֽשֶׁק׃ <S%H5402><s%> Na-shek. of battle

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> tit-Ten Grant יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh not O LORD מַאֲוַיֵּ֣י <S%H3970><s%> ma-'a-vai-Yei the desires רָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> ra-Sha'; of the wicked זְמָמ֥וֹ <S%H2162><s%> ze-ma-Mo not his wicked device אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תָּ֝פֵ֗ק <S%H6329><s%> ta-Fek, further יָר֥וּמוּ <S%H7311><s%> ya-Ru-mu [lest] they exalt סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. themselves Selah

רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh [As for] the head מְסִבָּ֑י <S%H4524><s%> me-sib-Bai; of those that compass me about עֲמַ֖ל <S%H5999><s%> 'a-Mal let the mischief שְׂפָתֵ֣ימוֹ <S%H8193><s%> se-fa-Tei-mov of their own lips; יְכַסּוּמֹו ye-chas-su-mov כיְכַסֵּֽמֹו <S%H3680><s%> ye-chas-Se-mov clad self ק

יָמִיטוּ ya-mi-tu כיִמֹּ֥וטוּ <S%H4131><s%> yim-Mo-tu be carried קעֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, and גֶּֽחָ֫לִ֥ים <S%H1513><s%> ge-Cha-Lim Let burning coals בָּאֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> ba-'Esh into the fire יַפִּלֵ֑ם <S%H5307><s%> yap-pi-Lem; upon them let them be cast בְּ֝מַהֲמֹר֗וֹת <S%H4113><s%> be-ma-ha-mo-Rot, into deep pits בַּֽל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- cannot יָקֽוּמוּ׃ <S%H6965><s%> ya-Ku-mu. that they rise not up again

אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish man לָשׁוֹן֮ <S%H3956><s%> la-shOn babbler בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- lest יִכּ֪וֹן <S%H3559><s%> yik-Kon be established בָּ֫אָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz in the earth אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- man חָמָ֥ס <S%H2555><s%> cha-Mas the violent רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> Ra'; evil יְ֝צוּדֶ֗נּוּ <S%H6679><s%> ye-tzu-Den-nu, shall hunt לְמַדְחֵפֹֽת׃ <S%H4073><s%> le-mad-che-Fot. to overthrow

יָדַעְתָּ ya-da'-ta כיָדַ֗עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ti, acknowledge קכִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh will maintain יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that the LORD דִּ֣ין <S%H1779><s%> din the cause עָנִ֑י <S%H6041><s%> 'a-Ni; of the afflicted מִ֝שְׁפַּ֗ט <S%H4941><s%> mish-Pat, [and] the right אֶבְיֹנִֽים׃ <S%H34><s%> 'ev-yo-Nim. of the poor

אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> 'ach Surely צַ֭דִּיקִים <S%H6662><s%> Tzad-di-kim Surely the righteous יוֹד֣וּ <S%H3034><s%> yo-Du shall give thanks לִשְׁמֶ֑ךָ <S%H8034><s%> lish-Me-cha; unto thy name יֵשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> ye-she-Vu shall dwell יְ֝שָׁרִ֗ים <S%H3477><s%> ye-sha-Rim, the upright אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-cha. in thy presence
